title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 49.4 - Toilet facilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 49.4 - Toilet facilities

State Regulations

Clean and sanitary toilets must be made available in or
near the livestock auction building. Separate toilets for men and women must be
provided and if outside must be disinfected at least once a week. Tight
insect-proof vaults and self-closing lids are required in outside
toilets. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
49.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
